sources.title: Law of the West
sources.description: For revenge the outlaw Morgan (Ed Brady) steals the Carruthers young son. Seventeen years later Carruthers (Hank Bell) arrives in the valley where Morgan, his gang, and the now grown Bob (Bob Steele) hide.

sources.title: Law of the West (1932) BOB STEELE
sources.description:
Stars: Bob Steele, Nancy Drexel, Ed Brady
 Director: Robert N. Bradbury

 For revenge the outlaw Morgan steals the Carruthers young son. Seventeen years later Carruthers arrives in the valley where Morgan, his gang, and the now grown Bob hide. After Morgan shoots Tracy, he tells Bob that Carruthers did it and sends Bob out after him. But unknown to Bob, Morgan has put blanks in his gun.

metadata.Plot: For revenge the outlaw Morgan steals the Carruthers young son. Seventeen years later Carruthers arrives in the valley where Morgan, his gang, and the now grown Bob hide. After Morgan shoots Tracy, he tells Bob that Carruthers did it and sends Bob out after him. But unknown to Bob, Morgan has put blanks in his gun.
metadata.Actors: Bob Steele, Nancy Drexel, Ed Brady
